configuration.description: YAML content containing the abstracted configuration. Exactly one of `configuration`, `configuration_file`, or `configuration_path` must be set.

configuration_file.description: Full path to YAML file containing the abstracted configuration. Exactly one of `configuration`, `configuration_file`, or `configuration_path` must be set.

configuration_path.description: Full path to directory containing one or more YAML files containing the abstracted configuration. Exactly one of `configuration`, `configuration_file`, or `configuration_path` must be set.

base_version.description: Version of the app, directly from the provider

effective_version.description: Version of the app, accounting for patch count

patch_count.description: Number of patches to the app since setting/changing its version

block.description: Generate an App's version based on content changes.

effective_version.description: Version of the app, accounting for patch count

patch_count.description: Number of patches to the app since setting/changing its version

path.description: Path in which to create the app file

tarball_path.description: Full path of the generated tarball

block.description: Create a tarball for an app. Generated app.conf's version will be automatically incremented when app content changes.
Get attributes for a specific app

app_ids.description: List of App IDs in the Splunk Configuration

block.description: Tags to exclude for returned App IDs
Tags to require for returned App IDs
Return App IDs from the Splunk Configuration

patch_count.description: Patch count to apply to the app's version

path.description: Path in which to create the app file

tarball_path.description: Full path of the generated tarball

field_names.description: List of fields in the lookup

row_number_field.description: Name of field to hold the row number. If not set, no field will be created for row numbers.

rows.description: List of rows in the lookup

block.description: Get fields and rows for a specific lookup

capabilities.description: List of capabilities assigned to the role

cumulative_realtime_search_jobs_quota.description: Cumulative real-time search jobs quota applied to the role

cumulative_search_jobs_quota.description: Cumulative search jobs quota applied to the role

imported_roles.description: List of roles imported by the role

realtime_search_jobs_quota.description: Real-time search jobs quota applied to the role

search_disk_quota.description: Search disk quota applied to the role

search_filter.description: Search filter applied to the role

search_indexes_allowed.description: List of indexes searchable by the role

search_jobs_quota.description: Search jobs quota applied to the role

search_time_win.description: Search time window applied to the role

block.description: Get attributes for a specific role

role_names.description: List of Role Names in the Splunk Configuration

block.description: Return Role Names from the Splunk Configuration

roles.description: List of roles associated with the SAML group

block.description: Get attributes for a specific SAML group

saml_group_names.description: List of SAML Group Names in the Splunk Configuration

force_change_pass.description: Force password change status of the user
